abstract: Sanofi Aventis of France said on Wednesday that it had received the green light from U.S. antitrust regulators to take-over the American biotech company Genzyme.
snippet: Sanofi Aventis of France said on Wednesday that it had received the green light from U.S. antitrust regulators to take-over the American biotech company Genzyme.
lead_paragraph: Sanofi-Aventis of France said on Wednesday that it had received approval from United States antitrust regulators to take over the American biotechnology company Genzyme, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Sanofi Gets U.S. Antitrust Approval on Genzyme Bid
